review: I've been looking high and low for a device that can get my spotify sounds to come out of my TV. FINALLY I found Amazon Fire TV stick. It's got all your standard apps plus Spotify Connect which is everything I ever hoped for. Also, I'm definitely feeling this little remote guy. I have Google Chromecast also and I'd say they are similar products but function a little differently. Chromecast operates from apps on your phone. Amazon Fire TV stick is completely self sufficient and doesn't require a phone to operate although essentially you can use both products to control apps on your TV. I like Amazon Fire TV stick a little bit better than Chromecast if I'm honest.
